Welcome to my portfolio!

Let me show you who I am and how I can help you achieve your goals.

From the first time I sat in front of a computer I knew that computing was going to change the world. My world. From my first batch games as a kid to automating tasks using Office macros and VBA, to building web solutions, solving problems through technology has been the best part of my work. I like to put my skills and passion to work in helping web solutions innovators build awesome experiences to customers and users.

See some of my projects and what I can help you with.

Please see below a sample of my Web Development projects. Click on the links to reveal the technologies I used, to visit the project or to visit the code repo.

Omnifood

Premium food delivery service

Project I completed as part of part of the 'Build Responsive Real World Websites with HTML5 and CSS3' course.

Technologies Used
  • HTML5
  • CSS3 (Variables, Flexbox. Libraries: GridCSS, AnimateCSS)
  • Responsive Design (Media queries)
  • Javascript (jQuery, WaypointJS)
  • Website Optimisation (Performance Optimisation, Cross-browser Testing, Cross-browser Compatibility, Google Analytics, Lighthouse Audit)
  • Website Deployment (cPanel)
